sense.def:
To be reunited with one's family or friends
pomeni spet srečati sorodnike ali prijatelje, ki jih že dolgo nismo videli.

seg.quote: It won't be long before you are reunited with your family.

sense.def:
To reunite a divided organization or country
pomeni doseči, da se razcepljena organizacija ali država spet poveže v celoto.

seg.quote: He worked to reunite the Labour movement.
